title: [Jens_Jacobsen,Tilman_Schlenker,Lisa_Edwards]Implementing a Digi
description:
Learn how the top CG film, computer game and web development companies have saved significant time and money on their projects by optimizing digital asset management systems and streamlining production processes. Also included is a product overview with 28 detailed descriptions of software solutions, including screenshots and prices, as well as a practical assessment of their suitability for different industries & project sizes.

Language: English
ISBN-10: 0240806654
ISBN-13: 978-0240806655

Editorial Reviews
Review
"It's certainly a challenging read, but one that's worth spending some brain power on if you're keen to create a successful computer-based production company. Getting into such a competitive market means doing some research, and for aspiring imageers this is a great first step." - Advanced Photoshop
Book Description
Learn how the right Digital Asset Management system can save you time and money
